title: Waypoint followed
text: With the ship repaired, I flew over to the coordinate to find a similar buliding as before, this one is much larger.
This one was empty, I was hoping for another of those robot people to be here, I feel like I could learn so much from them.
A looked though a few boxes and found some fuel for the ship, I'm not usually one for stealing, but I'm in a tight situation.
The console was left unlocked and I was able to learn how to upgrade the power of my mining beam.
